text: Group C of the 2018 FIFA World Cup took place from 16 to 26 June 2018. The group consisted of France, Australia, Peru, and Denmark. The top two teams advanced to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance winners 15 November 2017 5th 1982 Quarter-finals (1970), Second round (1978) 10 C4 3 UEFA UEFA Second Round winners 14 November 2017 5th 2010 Quarter-finals (1998) 19 ;Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group C will advance to play the runners-up of Group D. * The runners-up of Group C will advance to play the winners of Group D. ==Matches== All times listed are local time. ===France vs Australia=== The two teams have played four time before the most recently was a friendly in 2013, and France won 6-0. {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Hugo
